name: Corolla Altis Hybrid
description: The Corolla Altis Hybrid is a full-sized luxury car manufactured by Rolls-Royce Motor Cars. The Ghostnameplate, named in honour of the Silver Ghost, a car first produced in 1906, was announced in April 2009 at the Auto Shanghai show. The production model was officially unveiled at the 2009 Frankfurt Motor Show.
